name: mango-rust
description: A self-hosted manga/comic reader written in Rust. Drop-in replacement for [Mango](https://github.com/getmango/Mango) with better performance and 100% database compatibility.

scripts.build:css: lessc static/css/mango.less static/dist/css/mango.css && lessc static/css/tags.less static/dist/css/tags.css
scripts.build: npm run copy:img && npm run copy:font && npm run build:css
